website_summaries.verdict: Choose this anime plush toy for My Hero Academia enthusiasts or anyone who simply wants to add a new toy to his or her collect that features classic anime design.
pros: Popular character Izuku Midoriya from the Japanese superhero series My Hero Academia
Well-made with lots of attention to detail, especially in the hair, clothing, and shoes
cons: Dedicated fans of the series have suggested the eyes aren't exact replicas of the actual character's eyes, but this probably won't concern most anime fans

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute!! I bought this Deku and a Bakugou and they are both very well made! Facial features are embroidered and I can't find any flaws in him! I will probably get any other GE bnha plushies they make in this line bc I think they did a great job on them :) He even has a string out the top of his head to display him from!
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic with a nitpick
customer_reviews.text: Midoriya looks great, Hes perfectly sized, cute and well fitting, the only thing I don't like is his eyes, while they are embroidered, I feel they aren't as accurate as they could be to the show's eyes (bit to round, should be more like a C) and the coloring on his eyes. His eyes normally are mostly black, with the deep green shade at the bottom (with the white shine to the side.) but that's just a nitpick, I do hope they release his Costume Beta and Gamma Hero suits as plushies, I know his alpha (mom costume) is one, but I'd like the others!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Curley

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: He’s so cute; idk what to do anymore 😂 I’m super happy I bring him to work; I hug him; I put accessories on him Plus Ultra! 😆
customer_reviews.author: Tory Harine

customer_reviews.title: great doll
customer_reviews.text: great high quality doll, bought for my sister and she enjoys and values this doll.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Go daughter loves them! Very hard to find these and they’re well made!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Donacio

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and high quality plush
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and high quality plush! The eyes are embroidered instead of those cheap platic iron ons. Definitely recamend for BNHA fans and plush collectors money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Berna

customer_reviews.title: This plush is awesome! They got all the details correct and everything ...
customer_reviews.text: This plush is awesome! They got all the details correct and everything they even added a tie! I love this plush so much and I ordered the suited deku plush yesterday so I can’t wait for him! :P
customer_reviews.author: RedRebel

customer_reviews.title: This doll is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This doll is perfect. The delivery is perfect. Anyway, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ERRORCODE13

customer_reviews.title: Pictures perfect
customer_reviews.text: better than i expected! I would definitely recommend this plush
customer_reviews.author: paul castro

customer_reviews.title: Lovely birthday gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friends birthday, and it's so cute! My friend loved it. The only issue I could see is to be careful with the jacket button area, cause it feels like it can rip pretty easily. I'm definitely gonna buy another one for my sister as well.
customer_reviews.author: Martin castrellon

customer_reviews.title: Super Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and she loves it!!! The plushie is made really well with strong meterial! If you are a fan of the show, then you should totally buy this adorable character plushie!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Wood

customer_reviews.title: He is a v good lad. I love him so much 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Ten out of ten would reccommend. I just wish there was an all might or present mic plush. Or aizawa plush :’)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really suggest
customer_reviews.text: He is so realistic and I love it I’ll be putting accessories on him and I suggest this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutie!
customer_reviews.text: He's absolutely adorable and well made. He looks nice in my collection of plushes.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Bouchier

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Its at a great size, and looks very much like the character. The head is a bit big though.

customer_reviews.title: I don't know any more
customer_reviews.text: Ok I haven't actually bought it but the comments say it's pretty good I don't think anybody's going to say it so I will he looks like he saw something and tramitized for the rest of his life
